name: Megabat
description:
Description:

Megabat is a simple puzzle action game where you control a fruit bat. Use gliding and air dashing to collect all the fruit to complete each level. (Current level count: 50, Goal is 50 for now)

Note: This is a simple prototype of a game concept that I hope to expand upon. Everything in the game is made from scratch.

  • Limited number of dashes (indicated in top right)
  • Can only glide for a certain amount of time


Notes:

  • Most things in the game is not final
  • Art will change
  • Sound will change
  • The only thing that may not change is the concept of the game and it's simple controls.
  • Feel free to leave feedback or report bugs. If you hate it or love the idea tell me why :)

Goals:

  1. Learn more about the Godot engine before I embark on a much larger project
  2. Finish a polished game
  3. 50 levels is the current goal but that could change I've got lots of ideas for this but I'm going to be looking for feedback as I build it.
  4. Make devlogs as I add work on this project to share my progress
